abilities.name: Twin Shadows
abilities.details: Grim's basic attacks fire twiceâ€”once from each gun. The second shot deals a percentage of the first shot's damage as [ap]magical damage[/] and applies on-hit effects.[n]He will shoot the same target, else another target in range. The second shot is also affected by critical strike modifiers, but the critical chance is based on the first shot.

abilities.name: Piercing Darkness
abilities.details: Grim fires a high-velocity shadow laser in a line, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical damage[/]) to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Dark Cloak
abilities.details: Grim flips his cloak, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all nearby enemies.[n]Dark Cloak can [bf]deflect[/] incoming basic attacks and projectiles back.

abilities.name: Dawning Shadow
abilities.details: Grim dashes a short distance, leaving a Dawning Shadow at his starting location for a few seconds. He can re-activate this ability to instantly return to the Dawning Shadow.[n]When Grim basic attacks an enemy target, if Dawning Shadow is within range, the shadow will also basic attack the target with Twin Shadows's double shots.

abilities.name: Last Whisper
abilities.details: Grim creates a Living Shadow that follows each of the nearby enemy heroes, causing them to be [db]nearsighted[/].[n]He can then recast Last Whisper to replace himself with any of the Living Shadows.[n]The enemy target that Grim replaces the shadow with will be [db]silenced[/] for a short duration.
